file_content.text: This is Gravity Hook Seven to Regulator post 2X4. Receiving the all-clear signal now.
Last one. You should be able to hit the gravity hook without anyone sounding alarms. Play this right, the Hutts will never know.
You'll have to assault the hook's base, then take a lift to the docking ring. That's where the command crew will be.
With the command crew gone, the gravity hook will be ours. Wait for my signal to dock.
Simple enough.
We're not in any hurry.
When the gravity hook is secure, I assume you join me? I'd like to put a face to that voice.
[Flirt] Then do we meet?
My... team and I will be joining you, yes.
Where are you and the rest of the support team now? Still in orbit?
What's your current status?
Affirmative. As soon as you've secured the docking ring, though, we'll come on board.
Your voice is grating. Show that you're useful to me, and do it soon.
You've been worthless so far.
Once the docking ring is secure, my team will come aboard. Maybe we'll be more to your liking then.
We have identified a member of the opposition: The mercenaries' overseer is the "pet project" of one of the Hutts running Makeb.
He's an alien Whiphid, trained from the time he was a cub to be a Hutt Cartel enforcer. Big and brutal; thought you should know.
This is Raspard to Regulator post 2X9. The Archon's pet freak is cracking down on security, so we still need that all-clear. Over.
Coming in now... got it. I'll let you get back to playing pazaak, or however you pass the time.
Support team to ground. Remember I mentioned the quakes? That was a minor one.
Any idea what's causing these groundquakes? Could they cause a problem?
What's behind the quakes?
Makeb's always been volatile, but local reports say it's been especially bad this year. Geologic shifts of some sort.
I'm not too worried, but I'll keep an eye out. I'll check in at the next bunker.
Nothing like having a planet move beneath you to keep you awake.
They keep things interesting.
Guess the mercenaries aren't enough opposition, then.
I'll check in at the next bunker. Keep moving, and be sure not to leave survivors.
I don't need a support team to notice the obvious. Stay off the line until you have something useful.
You're wasting my time.
This is Gravity Hook Seven to Regulator post 2X3--we have not received an all-clear signal.
A strike team is on its way--ah, nevermind. Signal just came through.
Sorry, Commander--some sort of comm disruption. Must've been another groundquake.
This is support team to ground. That's one clear. Whoever you are... keep doing what you're doing.
Name is Commander J'Ruush, trained from birth to be a Hutt Cartel enforcer. Big and brutal; thought you should know.
